mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, phone_number, create_time, authorities, credentials_non_expired, account_non_expired, account_non_locked, enabled) values ( #{user.username}, #{user.password}, #{user.phoneNumber}, #{user.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{authorities}, #{user.credentialsNonExpired}, #{user.accountNonExpired}, #{user.accountNonLocked}, #{user.enabled} )
mapper.select: select username, password, phone_number, create_time, authorities, credentials_non_expired, account_non_expired, account_non_locked, enabled from user where username = #{username}
select username, password, phone_number, create_time, authorities, credentials_non_expired, account_non_expired, account_non_locked, enabled from user where phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
